div.p: The present study could not have been performed without the help of those listed below in collecting sand lance specimens: Yasunori Sakurai, Kingo Ito, Akihiro Kijima, H. Yoshida, M. Takahashi, K. Yokogawa, M. Tomiyama, T. Matoba, D. Ochi, T. Mori, Y. Nakamura, N. Tanaka, K. Shimoda, M. Sano, N. Kono, and N. Hoshino.
